languages.text: {n}Старица испуганно отшатывается, разглядев полуслепыми глазами истинное лицо Ирлиэт.{/n} "З-Звездорожденн{mf|ый|ая} прибудет в компании с духом, дабы остановить несчастья сего мира", — так сказал этой правительнице жрец. Видеть духа средь живых... неправильно. Духи должны жить в мире духов, а люди — в мире людей".

traits.locale_text: {n}Старица испуганно отшатывается, разглядев полуслепыми глазами истинное лицо Ирлиэт.{/n} "З-Звездорожденн{mf|ый|ая} прибудет в компании с духом, дабы остановить несчастья сего мира", — так сказал этой правительнице жрец. Видеть духа средь живых... неправильно. Духи должны жить в мире духов, а люди — в мире людей".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: {n}The elder recoils in fear after making out Yrliet's true face with her half-blind eyes.{/n} "Th-the Starborn will be accompanied by a spirit to put an end to the misfortunes of this world — thus spoke the priest. Seeing a spirit among the living is... wrong. Spirits should stay in the spirit realm, and humans in the realm of the living."
languages.original_text: {n}Старица испуганно отшатывается, разглядев полуслепыми глазами истинное лицо Ирлиэт.{/n} "З-Звездорожденн{mf|ый|ая} прибудет в компании с духом, дабы остановить несчастья сего мира", — так сказал этой правительнице жрец. Видеть духа средь живых... неправильно. Духи должны жить в мире духов, а люди — в мире людей".

traits.locale_text: {n}The elderly priestess recoils in fear after making out the true face of Yrliet with her half-blind eyes.{/n} "Th-The Starborn will be accompanied by a spirit to put an end to the misfortunes of this world — thus told the priest to this ruler. Seeing a spirit among the living is... wrong. The spirits should live in the realm of the dead, and the humans in the realm of the living."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

traits.locale_text: {n}The elderly priestess recoils in fear after making out the true face of Yrliet with her half-blind eyes.{/n} "Th-The Starborn will be accompanied by a spirit to put an end to the misfortunes of this world — thus told the priest to this ruler. Seeing a spirit among the living is... wrong. The spirits should live in the realm of the dead, and the humans in the realm of the living."

Seeing a spirit among the living is... wrong. The spirits should live in the realm of the dead, and the humans in the realm of the living."

Seeing a spirit among the living is... wrong. The spirits should live in the realm of the dead, and the humans in the realm of the living."

Seeing a spirit among the living is... wrong. Spirits should stay in the spirit realm, and humans in the realm of the living."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

traits.locale_text: {n}The elder recoils in fear after making out Yrliet's true face with her half-blind eyes.{/n} "Th-the Starborn will be accompanied by a spirit to put an end to the misfortunes of this world — thus spoke the priest. Seeing a spirit among the living is... wrong. Spirits should stay in the spirit realm, and humans in the realm of the living."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: {n}La anciana sacerdotisa retrocede espantada al vislumbrar el verdadero rostro de Yrliet con sus ojos medio ciegos.{/n} «{mf|E-el Hijo|L-la Hija} de las Estrellas llegaría acompañad{mf|o|a} de un espíritu para poner fin a las desventuras de este mundo... Así habló el sacerdote. Ver un espíritu entre los vivos es... antinatural. Los espíritus deberían morar en el reino de los muertos, así como los humanos en el de los vivos».
languages.original_text: {n}The elder recoils in fear after making out Yrliet's true face with her half-blind eyes.{/n} "Th-the Starborn will be accompanied by a spirit to put an end to the misfortunes of this world — thus spoke the priest. Seeing a spirit among the living is... wrong. Spirits should stay in the spirit realm, and humans in the realm of the living."

traits.locale_text: {n}La anciana sacerdotisa retrocede espantada al vislumbrar el verdadero rostro de Yrliet con sus ojos medio ciegos.{/n} «{mf|E-el Hijo|L-la Hija} de las Estrellas llegaría acompañada de un espíritu para poner fin a las desventuras de este mundo... Así habló el sacerdote a esta jefa. Ver un espíritu entre los vivos es... antinatural. Los espíritus deberían morar en el reino de los muertos, así como los humanos en el de los vivos».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: {n}老妇人用半瞎的眼睛辨认出了伊莉耶特的面孔，随后恐惧地向后退了退。{/n}“‘神谕’曾……曾提起过，说星……星裔身边会陪伴着一位精魂，一同来结束这个世界的不幸。但精魂在活人之间现身……终究是件错事。精魂应当留在精魂的世界，人类应住在生者的世界。”
languages.original_text: {n}The elder recoils in fear after making out Yrliet's true face with her half-blind eyes.{/n} "Th-the Starborn will be accompanied by a spirit to put an end to the misfortunes of this world — thus spoke the priest. Seeing a spirit among the living is... wrong. Spirits should stay in the spirit realm, and humans in the realm of the living."

traits.locale_text: {n}老祭司用半瞎的眼睛辨认出了伊莉耶特的面孔，随后恐惧地向后退了退。{/n}“‘神谕’曾……曾告诉过此酋长，说星……星裔身边会陪伴着一位精魂，一同来结束这个世界的不幸。但精魂在活人之间现身……终究是件错事。精魂应住在死者的世界里，而人类应住在生者的世界。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: {n}L'ancienne recule de terreur lorsque ses yeux à moitié aveugles parviennent enfin à distinguer le véritable visage d'Yrliet.{/n} « {mf|Le... Le|La... La} Stellaire sera {mf|accompagné|accompagnée} d'un esprit qui mettra fin aux malheurs de ce monde, a dit le prêtre. Mais... les esprits n'ont pas leur place parmi les vivants. Ils doivent vivre dans le royaume des esprits et les humains, dans celui des vivants. »
languages.original_text: {n}The elder recoils in fear after making out Yrliet's true face with her half-blind eyes.{/n} "Th-the Starborn will be accompanied by a spirit to put an end to the misfortunes of this world — thus spoke the priest. Seeing a spirit among the living is... wrong. Spirits should stay in the spirit realm, and humans in the realm of the living."

traits.locale_text: {n}La vieille prêtresse recule de terreur lorsque ses yeux à moitié aveugles parviennent enfin à distinguer le visage d'Yrliet.{/n} « {mf|Le... Le|La... La} Stellaire sera {mf|accompagné|accompagnée} d'un esprit qui mettra fin aux malheurs de ce monde, a dit le prêtre à cette dirigeante. Mais... les esprits n'ont pas leur place parmi nous. Ils doivent vivre dans le royaume des morts et les humains, dans celui des vivants. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: {n}老人は、半分見えなくなった目でユリエットの素顔を確認した後、恐怖に身じろぎする。{/n}「ス、スターボーンはこの世の災いを終わらせるために精霊を伴うだろうと、司祭は告げました。生者の中に精霊がいるというのは…間違っております。精霊は死者の領域で、人間は生者の領域で生きるべきなのですから」
languages.original_text: {n}The elder recoils in fear after making out Yrliet's true face with her half-blind eyes.{/n} "Th-the Starborn will be accompanied by a spirit to put an end to the misfortunes of this world — thus spoke the priest. Seeing a spirit among the living is... wrong. Spirits should stay in the spirit realm, and humans in the realm of the living."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人は、半分見えなくなった目でユリエットの素顔を確認した後、恐怖に身じろぎする。{/n}「ス、スターボーンはこの世の災いを終わらせるために精霊を伴うだろうと、司祭は告げました。生者の中に精霊がいるというのは…間違っております。精霊は死者の領域で、人間は生者の領域で生きるべきなのですから」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: {n}Die Älteste schreckt verängstigt zurück, nachdem sie mit ihren halbblinden Augen Yrliets wahres Gesicht erkannt hat.{/n} "D-{mf|Der|Die} Sternengeborene wird von einem Geist begleitet, um dem Unglück dieser Welt ein Ende zu bereiten ... das hat der Priester gesagt. Einen Geist unter den Lebenden zu sehen ist ... falsch. Die Geister sollten im Reich der Toten leben, und die Menschen im Reich der Lebenden."
languages.original_text: {n}The elder recoils in fear after making out Yrliet's true face with her half-blind eyes.{/n} "Th-the Starborn will be accompanied by a spirit to put an end to the misfortunes of this world — thus spoke the priest. Seeing a spirit among the living is... wrong. Spirits should stay in the spirit realm, and humans in the realm of the living."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die alte Priesterin schreckt verängstigt zurück, nachdem sie mit ihren halbblinden Augen Yrliets wahres Gesicht erkannt hat.{/n} "D-{mf|Der|Die} Sternengeborene wird von einem Geist begleitet, um dem Unglück dieser Welt ein Ende zu bereiten ... das hat der Priester dieser Herrscherin gesagt. Einen Geist unter den Lebenden zu sehen ist ... falsch. Die Geister sollten im Reich der Toten leben, und die Menschen im Reich der Lebenden."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Civil_Overlord

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar, yarı kör gözleriyle Yrliet'in gerçek yüzünü görmesinin ardından korkuyla geri çekiliyor.{/n} "Y... Yıldızdoğan'a bu dünyada vuku bulan talihsizliklere son vermesi için bir ruh eşlik edecek. Rahip böyle buyurdu. Bu ruhu yaşayanlar arasında görmek... Doğru gelmiyor. Ruhların ruhani âlemde, insanların da yaşayanlar âleminde kalmaları gerekir."
languages.original_text: {n}The elder recoils in fear after making out Yrliet's true face with her half-blind eyes.{/n} "Th-the Starborn will be accompanied by a spirit to put an end to the misfortunes of this world — thus spoke the priest. Seeing a spirit among the living is... wrong. Spirits should stay in the spirit realm, and humans in the realm of the living."
